ISSUE.TITLE: Load multiple corpora in a single operation
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: The loaddocs command could accept multiple TSV files in the same operation, e.g. annif loaddocs tfidf-fi finna-fi.tsv fennica-fi.tsv makupalat-fi.tsv This would make it easy to test the effect of combining multiple corpora vs. using them alone.

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Support loading multiple document corpora in a single operation. Fixes #149
